official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that March 17, 1983, be recognized and observed as Irish Peace, Freedom, and Unity Day.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that March 17, 1983, Saint Patrick's Day, be recognized and observed as Irish Peace, Freedom, and Unity Day.
